edu.virginia.lib.ld2solr.impl

Class IndexRun

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.virginia.lib.ld2solr.spi.AbstractStage<IndexRun,NamedFields>
      • edu.virginia.lib.ld2solr.impl.IndexRun
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Stage<NamedFields>, Runnable

    public class IndexRun
extends AbstractStage<IndexRun,NamedFields>
implements Runnable
    A Stage of workflow that creates index records as NamedFields units. Implements Runnable because it is usually separated from the previous Stages of cache accumulation. This is to enable users to avoid (expensive, network-bound) retrieval operations if desired by beginning workflow with this Stage over a pre-assembled cache.
    Author:
    ajs6f
